amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 115-212 to prohibit funding for the preparatory commission for the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization except funds used for the international monitoring system.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Wilson (SC).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
